Description: Reference number to identify a packing list
Date/time when the packing list was issued
Name of the party consigning goods
Address of the party consigning goods
Name of the party to whom goods are consigned
Address of the party to whom goods are consigned
Reference to related transport document (e.g. B/L number)
Type of package (box, pallet, bundle, etc.)
Shipping marks and numbers on packages
Unique identifier for individual package (e.g. SSCC)
